mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auth_tokens (TOKEN, USER_NAME, TOKEN_TYPE, EXPIRY_DATE, CREATED_DATE, USED) VALUES (#{token}, #{userName}, #{tokenType}, #{expiryDate}, #{createdDate}, #{used})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, TOKEN, USER_NAME, TOKEN_TYPE, EXPIRY_DATE, CREATED_DATE, USED FROM auth_tokens WHERE TOKEN = #{token}
mapper.update: UPDATE auth_tokens SET USED = TRUE WHERE TOKEN = #{token}
UPDATE auth_tokens SET USED = TRUE WHERE USER_NAME = #{userName} AND TOKEN_TYPE = #{tokenType} AND USED = FALSE AND EXPIRY_DATE > NOW() -- 만료되지 않은 토큰만 무효화
mapper.select: SELECT ID, TOKEN, USER_NAME, TOKEN_TYPE, EXPIRY_DATE, CREATED_DATE, USED FROM auth_tokens WHERE USER_NAME = #{userName} AND TOKEN_TYPE = #{tokenType} ORDER BY CREATED_DATE DESC LIMIT 1
